titleStmt.title: The history of England giving a true and impartial account of the most considerable transactions in church and state, in peace and war, during the reigns of all the kings and queens, from the coming of Julius Cæsar into Britain : with an account of all plots, conspiracies, insurrections, and rebellions ... : likewise, a relation of the wonderful prodigies ... to the year 1696 ... : together with a particular description of the rarities in the several counties of England and Wales, with exact maps of each county / by John Seller ...
titleStmt.author: Seller, John, fl. 1658-1698.

biblFull.extent: [7], 680, [45] leaves of plates p. : ill., 43 maps.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Job and John How, for John Gwillim ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
